original_text: And God said, Behold, I have given you every herb bearing seed, which is upon the face of all the earth, and every tree, in the which is the fruit of a tree yielding seed; to you it shall be for meat.
korean_text: 하나님이 이르시되 내가 온 지면의 씨 맺는 모든 채소와 씨 가진 열매 맺는 모든 나무를 너희에게 주노니 너희의 먹을 거리가 되리라

sentences.original_text: I have given you every herb bearing seed,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게 씨 맺는 모든 풀을 주었고,

sentences.original_text: which is upon the face of all the earth,
in the which is the fruit of a tree yielding seed;
sentences.korean_translation: 그 나무는 씨 맺는 실과를 맺으니

sentences.original_text: to you it shall be for meat.
